definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: God is waiting to pour richest blessings upon you.
sentences.chinese: 神今天在等待，要厚厚地賜福與我們。

sentences.english: Bless this food to the nourishment of our bodies.
sentences.chinese: 賜福給這個食物吧，這是我們的身體所需的營養。

sentences.english: The LORD blessed the latter part of Job's life more than the first.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，耶和華後來賜福給約伯比先前更多。

sentences.english: Surely the latter end of Job was more blessed than the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 果然，耶和華後來賜福給約伯，比先前更多。
這就是一個蒙神賜福的人。

sentences.english: They will receive blessings from the LORD, and justice from their saving God.
sentences.chinese: 他必蒙耶和華賜福，又蒙救他的神使他成義。

sentences.english: God renews him and blesses him;
sentences.chinese: 神更新了他的生命，並且賜福給他。

sentences.english: Blessed are those who hunger and athirst for righteousness, for they shall be satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 賜福於飢餓和渴求正義的人們，因爲他們應得到滿足。

sentences.english: Heavenly God blesses the people, Earth God pardons the people and Water God dispels disasters.
sentences.chinese: 俗信天官賜福，地官赦罪，水官解厄。

sentences.english: May GOD have mercy on China and the Chinese, may your grace always be upon them. Shalom.
sentences.chinese: 願主保佑中國及其子民，願主常賜福與他們。

sentences.english: The Lord blessed the sabbath day and hal- lowed it.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華賜福與安息日，定爲聖日。

sentences.english: May your blessing be on your people.
First, let us bless the sea.
5He will receive blessing from the Lord and vindication from God his Savior.
sentences.chinese: 5他必蒙耶和華賜福，又蒙救他的神使他成義。

sentences.english: The blessing of the Lord was on everything Potiphar had, both in the house and in the field.
sentences.chinese: 凡家裏和田間一切所有的都蒙耶和華賜福。

sentences.english: Please also pray for his wife and his three children. May the Lord keep blessing this family.
sentences.chinese: 請爲他的妻子和孩子代禱，求神繼續賜福他的家庭。

definition: god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
(of a supernatural or divine being) to appear/to make itself manifest
favor/to give charity to sb out of pity
to pray/to pray for sth/to wish sth/prayer/wish
favorable weather (idiom); good weather for crops
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
